td.content: s:pt presents with severe cloudiness in both eyes, severe seeing halos around light, severe clouded, blurred vision in right eye and Head/Eyes/Ears/Nose/Throat for 4 weeks. patient is a 29 yr old f test pilot. she drinks 2 beers per night denies any smoking o:Height 176 cm, Weight 70.7 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 69, Respiration 16, non-dilated fundus examination obscuration of ocular fundus detail a:Cataracts p:performed non-dilated fundus examination, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Patient does not smoke drinks daily o:Height 176 cm, Weight 69.6 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 66, Respiration 15 a:Cataracts p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to otorhinolaryngology.
